description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Construction Management Plan), 4 (Materials), 7 (Construction Method Statement), 8 (Drainage), 11 (Community Use Agreement), 12 (External Lighting Strategy), 14 (Landscaping Scheme) & 15 (Nature Conservation) of planning permission 20/03077/FUL (Construction of a new 2-storey sports hall comprising hall, office, storage, foyer and viewing gallery with associated tree screening)
decision_conditions: The Sports Hall shall not be used for amplified music events. Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, in accordance with policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The  rear service road and access to the construction site shall only be used by pedestrians and cyclists during the construction period. The rear service road shall not be used for deliveries, or by vehicles to access the construction site.Reason: To ensure proper delivery and service management in the interests of the safety and operation of the highway network, in accordance with policies  policies DM10, CS7 and DM9 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
